snippet: A federal judge on Monday ordered an Irish drug manufacturer to halt its plans to discontinue its widely used Alzheimer's medication, allegedly in an effort to drive patients to a newer patented drug....

headline.print_headline: Judge Halts Alzheimer's Drug Swap Until July
headline.main: Judge Halts Alzheimer's Drug Swap Until July

lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Monday ordered an Irish drug manufacturer to halt its plans to discontinue its widely used Alzheimer's medication, allegedly in an effort to drive patients to a newer patented drug.
